name: IdeaFlow
signal_source: Creative workers describe apps that 'generate article outlines from your scattered thoughts' and help 'visually organize and connect ideas'
description: Visual idea organization tool that helps creative professionals connect scattered thoughts through spatial arrangement
target_user: Creative professionals and researchers who think visually and struggle with linear note-taking systems
pain_point_evidence: Users report traditional apps don't 'let me see my thoughts, no matter how scattered they are at first' and need 'visual manipulation with ease'
differentiation: Spatial thinking vs. linear notes, visual organization over text-based systems
subscription_fit: Premium includes unlimited idea maps, team collaboration, and advanced export formats

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic mapping, premium for unlimited maps and collaboration
